law.full_text:
PURPOSE.
The purpose of this Article is to prevent the displacement of tenants and the loss of rental units in the City of Los Angeles due to the foreclosure of the property, and to prevent homelessness and nuisances and blight caused by vacant foreclosed properties.

unit.text:
PURPOSE.
The purpose of this Article is to prevent the displacement of tenants and the loss of rental units in the City of Los Angeles due to the foreclosure of the property, and to prevent homelessness and nuisances and blight caused by vacant foreclosed properties.

unit.label: article
unit.name: Eviction Of Tenants From Foreclosed Residential Rental Properties

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
PURPOSE. (§ 49.90)
PURPOSE.
The purpose of this Article is to prevent the displacement of tenants and the loss of rental units in the City of Los Angeles due to the foreclosure of the property, and to prevent homelessness and nuisances and blight caused by vacant foreclosed properties.
